channel.title: Client tutorials
channel.description:
I think we need a separate forum for client tutorials, at the moment they are being posted in
Private Server Client Hacking Talk about your exploits with the 317 client here
Not really suitable for tutorials? the name, to me, says that forum is for showoffs?

item.title: Client tutorials
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:19, topic:376248”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=472181.msg3453048#msg3453048 date=1293887092]

MoparScape…being cleaner…?

Funny.

I believe half the community think new boards / complete database prune would benefit everyone.

Though, MITB thinks otherwise, that or he just doesn’t care what we say.

How would a database prune be beneficial

To clean inactive accounts / old posts.

To serve what purpose

He said reduce gravedigging, etc

Gravedigging is acceptable and encouraged in the Server Help section because it helps restrict the flow of useless threads in the occasion that someone does use the search bar.

Gravedigging, encouraged?
[/quote]

Why fill sections with threads that have already been answered previously[/quote]

there may be more efficient, better ways to answer questions?

Read full topic

item.title: Client tutorials
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=rash link=topic=472181.msg3453137#msg3453137 date=1293890508]

Not necessarily. But Mopar is always looking for staff, which I believe is to compensate for the time differences.

He should, i mean if all the staff are from UK/US, the australian users (like me) get stuck with all these advertisers, etc
[/quote]That’s why you report all the rule breakers you can, so the mods have hard days. ^.^[/quote]

I do, trust me.
An advertisement just popped up, im going to see how long it lasts

Read full topic

item.title: Client tutorials
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=rash link=topic=472181.msg3453117#msg3453117 date=1293889563]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=472181.msg3453111#msg3453111 date=1293889377]

Understandable, but seeing this is a large forum, it should have at least one staff member on at all times, or even 1-2 hours apart.

Ah, true, but then post counts will be cut, etc
[/quote]It’s not a large forum… We have maybe 100-200 people on a day. (Most of them being guests)

Post count doesn’t matter, and I’m a clear example of that.
I’m less than 300 posts from being in MSCP top 10 posters, and I joined in March '10. (6K+ posts in 10 months.) (Plus a lot which were deleted, so actually like 7k)

Thats true, but the people who post, post in wrong sections etc.

Yesterday there was an advertisement for like 4 hours.

[/quote]And that’s where the more/heavily enforced rules come in.

[quote author=Phaze One link=topic=472181.msg3453121#msg3453121 date=1293889636]

MoparScape…being cleaner…?

Funny.

I believe half the community think new boards / complete database prune would benefit everyone.

Though, MITB thinks otherwise, that or he just doesn’t care what we say.

How would a database prune be beneficial
[/quote]To clean inactive accounts / old posts.[/quote]

You need more active staff to enforce rules efficiently

Read full topic

item.title: Client tutorials
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]No point in changing the forum system.

SMF is good.

It’s a forum, it serve’s it’s purpose. It doesn’t need to be fancy.

All we need is more moderation, more/heavily enforced rules, and a database pruning.[/quote]

True, but it makes it look cheap ^.^

Definitely, i was just flaming someone (im bored ) and no moderators have stepped in or anything.

Why a db prune?

Read full topic

item.title: Client tutorials
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Yea, but im saying the forums needs a complete redo.

Maybe upgrade to IPBpro, redo the forums so they are cleaner, etc

Read full topic

item.title: Client tutorials
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=rash link=topic=472181.msg3453069#msg3453069 date=1293887673]

How do you think I feel with the Server Help section?

I go there to help people and all I see is constant repost after repost, with the occasional question / advertisement.

Mopar needs to undergo a big, something.

dont know what, something needs to change tho.

Its honestly despised by most other rsps communities.
[/quote]R~S is not an RSPS community. It is a merely gathering place for false elitist, intermediate hackers, and graphic artists.

rL is basically the same.[/quote]

They are classed as rsps communities tho.

Read full topic
